name: Don't Go Into The Woods (itch)
description:
Don't Go Into The Woods shall capture you with it's dark and oppressive atmosphere and puts you into the role of John who is searching in the dark woods for his lost wife Bonny. 

This game is my first playable Game-Project as a student.
See this game as an atmospheric walking-simulator with an environment which is not interactive but reacts to you. Focus was on the Creature Design, Cinematics and overall Ingame-horror-atmosphere.

It crashes sometimes at the first start, when it loads the level. If you restart the Game it should be fine. Sorry in advance for not making the cut scenes skippable^^

My Linked In Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ben-jahn-59a86a1b6
